careerBank.description: Provides healthcare and assistance to patients.
Analyzes complex data to help organizations make decisions.
careerBank.educationPath: Master's in Data Science or related field

careerBank.description: Creates visual concepts to communicate ideas.
Manages financial records and prepares reports.

quizQuestions.question: Do you enjoy working with numbers and data?

answersMapping.Yes: Consider careers in Data Science, Accounting, or Engineering
answersMapping.No: Explore careers in Creative Arts or Communication
answersMapping.Sometimes: You might enjoy a mix like Marketing Analytics

quizQuestions.question: Do you like working with people?

answersMapping.Yes: Teaching, Sales, and Counseling may suit you
answersMapping.No: Consider careers in Research or Software Development

quizQuestions.question: Are you interested in technology and computers?

answersMapping.Yes: Software Engineering, Data Science, or IT roles could be a good fit
answersMapping.No: Consider roles in Healthcare, Education, or Arts
answersMapping.A little: Marketing or Business Analysis may blend tech and other interests

quizQuestions.question: Do you prefer creative tasks over analytical ones?

answersMapping.Creative: Graphic Design, Marketing, or Arts careers may suit you
answersMapping.Analytical: Engineering, Accounting, or Data Science could be ideal
answersMapping.Both: Product Management or UX Design might be a good mix

quizQuestions.question: Would you rather work indoors or outdoors?

answersMapping.Indoors: Consider office-based roles like Software Engineer or Accountant
answersMapping.Outdoors: Look into careers in Environmental Science or Field Research
answersMapping.No preference: Many careers offer both, such as Teaching or Consulting

videos.title: How to Choose a Career Path

articles.title: How to Write a Winning Resume

successStories.name: Jane Doe
successStories.story: Jane started her own business after years of working in tech and now mentors young founders.

successStories.name: Carlos Rivera
successStories.story: Carlos transitioned from teaching to software engineering after completing an online bootcamp and now works at a leading tech company.

successStories.name: Priya Singh
successStories.story: Priya leveraged her background in mathematics to become a data scientist and now leads analytics projects in healthcare.

successStories.name: Michael Lee
successStories.story: Michael turned his passion for art into a successful freelance graphic design business, working with global brands.

successStories.name: Aisha Patel
successStories.story: Aisha found her calling in nursing, helping patients recover and supporting families through difficult times. She now leads a team at a major hospital.

successStories.name: David Kim
successStories.story: David's curiosity for how things work led him to engineering. He now designs eco-friendly vehicles and mentors young engineers.

successStories.name: Fatima Al-Sayed
successStories.story: Fatima started as a marketing intern and rose to lead global campaigns for a tech startup, inspiring others with her creativity and leadership.

successStories.name: Liam O'Connor
successStories.story: Liam's passion for teaching has impacted hundreds of students. He now develops innovative curricula and trains new teachers.

successStories.name: Sophia Rossi
successStories.story: Sophia turned her love for numbers into a successful accounting career, helping small businesses thrive and mentoring young professionals.

guidanceTopics.title: Preparing for University Admission
guidanceTopics.content: Step-by-step guidance on writing personal statements, preparing for entrance exams, and building a strong application profile.

guidanceTopics.title: Career Coaching Sessions
guidanceTopics.content: Book one-on-one sessions with certified career coaches to explore career options and create an action plan.

guidanceTopics.title: Scholarship Application Tips
guidanceTopics.content: Learn how to find scholarships, write compelling essays, and submit strong applications.

guidanceTopics.title: Interview Preparation for College and Jobs
guidanceTopics.content: Get practical advice and mock interview practice to boost your confidence for admissions and job interviews.
